articles.description: While the wait for 5G spectrum in the over 3GHz band continues, Jio’s slow data volume growth and subscriber share loss is likely to result in some spending to beef up 4G capacity
articles.content: MUMBAI: Spectrum auctions have been major events in the history of the Indian telecom sector. Irrational bids in the past have resulted in high indebtedness and brought some firms to their knees. The… [+4163 chars]

articles.description: Dream Sports, the operator of Dream11, Fan Code and Dream Pay, is looking to get funding by way of a secondary share sale that will provide an exit to early-stage investors, including China's Tencent Holdings.

articles.title: Iraq decides to freeze oil prepayments deal as oil prices rising - Economic Times
articles.description: We had concerns that oil prices would not rise above $40 when we announced this deal for the first time in the history of Iraq,  Ihsan Abdul Jabbar told the channel.
articles.content:
Iraq has decided to freeze its first crude oil prepayment deal, which had aimed to boost its finances, because oil prices are rising, the country's oil minister told BBC Arabic on Sunday.

articles.title: Horrific video shows engine of United Airlines plane in flames in mid-air - Times Now
articles.description: In the video recorded from what appeared to be inside the plane, the right engine of the aircraft can be seen wobbling on the wing of the Boeing 777-200.
articles.content:
• If you find debris please don't touch it or move it, tweeted Bloomfield police
  • The horrific video was shot by passengers aboard the United Airlines flight
